channel.title: PK point exchange shop
channel.description: Hey im using a edgeville pvp source 317. I want to know how to edit prices for pvp points, i know how to do regular money but not points. Thanks.

item.title: PK point exchange shop
item.dc:creator: @blitz_ags blitz ags
item.description:
@blitz_ags wrote:

[quote=“yeoldhag, post:1, topic:343199”]Hey im using a edgeville pvp source 317. I want to know how to edit prices for pvp points, i know how to do regular money but not points. Thanks.[/quote]You want them cost “money” or “pk points” or you just want to reduce the price? or raise it? what do you really want.

its pretty much the same i think try going into the item.cfg file and finding the item and out of all the numbers its the second set in hope this helped
